first.speaker: Center
first.content: You are sending back to your time on the earth, and because of you saved dinosaurs from the comet, they become the master of the earth.

12.speaker: Center
12.content: You are captured by them, luckily, they think you look special, so instead of eating you, they put you into a zoo.

13.speaker: Center
13.content: Somehow you can understand them, but they can't understand you.

14.speaker: Curator
14.content: My my. You are really a weird monkey.

14-1.speaker: Curator
14-1.content: I'm the curator of this zoo, I bought you from PETA.

15.speaker: Curator
15.content: I hope you to be popular. If you can't earn enough money for me, guess who will pay your food?

16.speaker: Curator
16.content: Nobody. But we don't want that happen right?

17.speaker: Curator
17.content: Be a good monkey and behave yourself, I'll feed you if you earn enough money.
